title: Visualisation Functions for Health-GPS
text: goal healthgpsrvis plot visualise data related Health-GPS.

text: RStudio installed

title: Visualisation Functions for Health-GPS

title: Visualisation Functions for Health-GPS
text: example create weighted data using package: plot risk factor (say, “bmi”) weighted data, can use following code:  plot difference risk factor (say, “bmi”) weighted data, can use following code:  plot cumulative incidence difference , say, “diabetes”, can use following code:  plot burden disease , say, “yld”, can use following code:
code: library(healthgpsrvis)  # Get the path to the .rds file filepath <- testthat::test_path("testdata", "data_ps3_reformulation")  # Read the .rds file data <- readRDS(filepath)  # Generate the weighted data data_weighted <- gen_data_weighted(data)  # Generate the weighted data for the risk factors data_weighted_rf_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_rf(data_weighted)  # View structure of the weighted data for the risk factors str(data_weighted_rf_wide_collapse) #> tibble [34 × 13] (S3: tbl_df/tbl/data.frame) #>  $ time             : int [1:34] 2022 2023 2024 2025 2026 2027 2028 2029 2030 2031 ... #>  $ diff_sodium_mean : num [1:34] 0 0 -33.7 -33.7 -33.6 ... #>  $ diff_sodium_min  : num [1:34] 0 0 -33.7 -33.7 -33.7 ... #>  $ diff_sodium_max  : num [1:34] 0 0 -33.7 -33.6 -33.5 ... #>  $ diff_ei_mean     : num [1:34] 0 0 -23.1 -23.1 -23.1 ... #>  $ diff_ei_min      : num [1:34] 0 0 -23.2 -23.2 -23.2 ... #>  $ diff_ei_max      : num [1:34] 0 0 -23.1 -23.1 -23.1 ... #>  $ diff_bmi_mean    : num [1:34] 0 0 -0.0852 -0.1178 -0.133 ... #>  $ diff_bmi_min     : num [1:34] 0 0 -0.0852 -0.1178 -0.1333 ... #>  $ diff_bmi_max     : num [1:34] 0 0 -0.0852 -0.1177 -0.1328 ... #>  $ diff_obesity_mean: num [1:34] 0 0 -0.00258 -0.00363 -0.00419 ... #>  $ diff_obesity_min : num [1:34] 0 0 -0.0026 -0.00365 -0.00422 ... #>  $ diff_obesity_max : num [1:34] 0 0 -0.00256 -0.00362 -0.00416 ... # Plot the risk factor "bmi" riskfactors("bmi", data_weighted) # Plot of difference in the risk factor "bmi" riskfactors_diff("bmi",                   data_weighted_rf_wide_collapse,                  scale_y_continuous_limits = c(-0.148, 0),                  scale_y_continuous_breaks = c(-0.148, -0.074, 0),                  scale_y_continuous_labels = c(-0.148, -0.074, 0)) #> Warning: Use of `data_weighted_rf_wide_collapse$time` is discouraged. #> ℹ Use `time` instead. #> Use of `data_weighted_rf_wide_collapse$time` is discouraged. #> ℹ Use `time` instead. data_weighted_ds_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_ds(data_weighted) inc_cum("diabetes",     data_weighted_ds_wide_collapse,     scale_y_continuous_limits = c(-4424000, 0),     scale_y_continuous_breaks = c(-4424000, -4084000, -3743000, -3403000, -3063000, -2722000, -2382000, -2042000, -1701000, -1361000, -1021000, -681000, -340000, 0),     scale_y_continuous_labels = scales::comma(c(-4424000, -4084000, -3743000, -3403000, -3063000, -2722000, -2382000, -2042000, -1701000, -1361000, -1021000, -681000, -340000, 0))   ) #> Warning: Use of `data_weighted_ds_wide_collapse$time` is discouraged. #> ℹ Use `time` instead. #> Use of `data_weighted_ds_wide_collapse$time` is discouraged. #> ℹ Use `time` instead. data_weighted_bd_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_burden(data_weighted) burden_disease("yld", data_weighted_bd_wide_collapse) #> Warning: Use of `data_weighted_bd_wide_collapse$time` is discouraged. #> ℹ Use `time` instead. #> Use of `data_weighted_bd_wide_collapse$time` is discouraged. #> ℹ Use `time` instead.

title: Data Processing — DataProcessing
text: file contains set functions designed work together processing data. description use functions sequence.

title: Data Processing — DataProcessing
text: Read data: function reads data location specified data <-  readRDS("data.rds"). gen_data_weighted: Calculates weighted mean values various metrics years data_weighted <- gen_data_weighted(data). gen_data_weighted_rf: Calculates differences intervention baseline values risk factors data_weighted_rf_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_rf(data_weighted). gen_data_weighted_ds: Calculates differences intervention baseline values incidences data_weighted_ds_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_ds(data_weighted). gen_data_weighted_burden: Calculates differences intervention baseline values burden disease data_weighted_burden_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_burden(data_weighted). gen_data_weighted_burden_spline: Performs data smoothing burden disease, necessary. instance, simulations, can positive values difference burden disease data_weighted_burden_spline <- gen_data_weighted_burden_spline(data_weighted_burden_wide_collapse). gen_data_le: Calculates life expectancy various age groups data_ple_wide <- gen_data_le(data_weighted).

title: Data Processing — DataProcessing
code: # Example of using all functions together data <- readRDS("data.rds") data_weighted <- gen_data_weighted(data) data_weighted_rf_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_rf(data_weighted) data_weighted_ds_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_ds(data_weighted) data_weighted_burden_wide_collapse <- gen_data_weighted_burden(data_weighted) data_weighted_burden_spline <- gen_data_weighted_burden_spline(data_weighted_burden_wide_collapse) data_ple_wide <- gen_data_le(data_weighted)

what: Plot of Burden of Disease — burden_disease
title: Plot of Burden of Disease — burden_disease
text: Creates line plot showing reduction specified burden disease time.

title: Plot of Burden of Disease — burden_disease
code: burden_disease(   burden,   data_weighted_bd_wide_collapse,   scale_y_continuous_limits = NULL,   scale_y_continuous_breaks = ggplot2::waiver(),   scale_y_continuous_labels = ggplot2::waiver() )

title: Plot of Burden of Disease — burden_disease
text: burden character string specifying burden disease plot. Options : "daly", "dalycum", "yld", "yll". data_weighted_bd_wide_collapse data frame differences intervention baseline values burden disease. scale_y_continuous_limits numeric vector specifying limits scales continuous y aesthetics. scale_y_continuous_breaks numeric vector specifying breaks scales continuous y aesthetics. scale_y_continuous_labels numeric vector specifying labels scales continuous y aesthetics.

title: Plot of Burden of Disease — burden_disease
text: ggplot object representing specified plot.

title: Combined Plot of several metrics — combine_plots
code: combine_plots(   metrics,   data_weighted = NULL,   data_mean_weighted_rf_wide = NULL,   data_mean_weighted_inc_wide = NULL,   data_weighted_bd_wide_collapse = NULL,   data_ple_wide = NULL,   output_file )

title: Combined Plot of several metrics — combine_plots
text: metrics list specifying metrics plot. data_weighted data frame weighted values various metrics. data_mean_weighted_rf_wide data frame containing weighted mean values risk factors. data_mean_weighted_inc_wide data frame containing weighted mean values incidences. data_weighted_bd_wide_collapse data frame differences intervention baseline values burden disease. data_ple_wide data frame containing life expectancy. output_file Name output PDF string

title: Combined Plot of several metrics — combine_plots
text: combined ggplot object arranged grid.

title: Customised theme for ggplot2 — hgps_theme
text: function creates customised theme ggplot2 plots. modifies various elements default theme_classic() provide specific style.

title: Customised theme for ggplot2 — hgps_theme
Customised theme for ggplot2 — hgps_theme
text: ggplot2 theme object customised settings plot title, axis titles, axis text, legend text, legend title, major grid lines, legend key background, legend position.

title: Customised theme for ggplot2 — hgps_theme
text: hgps_theme function modifies following elements classic theme: plot.title: Sets font size plot title (default 15). axis.title.x: Sets font size x-axis title (default 10). axis.title.y: Sets font size y-axis title (default 10). axis.text.x: Sets font size x-axis text (default 8). axis.text.y: Sets font size y-axis text (default 8). legend.text: Sets font size legend text (default 8). legend.title: Removes legend title. panel.grid.major.x: Adds major grid lines x-axis. legend.key: Sets legend key background (default "transparent"). legend.position: Positions legend (default coordinates (0.8, 0.9)).

title: Customised theme for ggplot2 — hgps_theme
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ library(ggplot2) ggplot(mtcars, aes(x = wt, y = mpg)) +   geom_point() +   hgps_theme() } # }

what: Set up a new plotting device — set_graphics
title: Set up a new plotting device — set_graphics
text: function closes existing graphical devices opens new one specified width height dimensions.

title: Set up a new plotting device — set_graphics
Set up a new plotting device — set_graphics
text: width Numeric value specifying width new plotting device centimeters. height Numeric value specifying height new plotting device centimeters.

title: Set up a new plotting device — set_graphics
text: set_graphics function first closes open graphical devices using graphics.(). opens new graphical device given dimensions using dev.new(). unit parameter set "cm" use centimeters dimensions, noRStudioGD set TRUE avoid using RStudio's graphical device.

title: Set up a new plotting device — set_graphics
code: if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{ # Set up a new plotting device with width 10 cm and height 7 cm set_graphics(10, 7) } # }
